basic.Target Organism: [Ref.24473083]MERS-COV(Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus):inhibition of cell–cell fusion infection in Huh-7 and 293T/MERS/EGFP cells (IC50=0.93±0.15µM); inhibition of MERS-CoV infection in Vero cells (IC50=0.6µM); inhibition of MERS-CoV infection in Calu-3 cells (IC50=0.6µM); inhibition of MERS-CoV infection in HFL cells (IC50=13.9µM).
